about_the_game:
Flower Corner is a relaxing idle game where you nurture and grow a variety of plants while doing other activities on your computer. The game sits at the bottom of your screen, quietly blooming in the background, allowing you to enjoy a peaceful gardening experience without interrupting your daily routine.

Casual and Customizable: Arrange your garden with different plants, pots, and decorations to create your own mini green space. As you unlock new species and items, you can customize your garden to reflect your personal style.

No Pressure: There’s no rush in Flower Corner. Whether you check in every hour or once a day, your plants will always be waiting for you, making it perfect for those who want a low-maintenance, calming experience.

Minimal Distraction: Designed to fit seamlessly into your screen's, Flower Corner is unobtrusive, letting you enjoy your virtual garden while multitasking. It’s a soothing addition to your day without requiring constant attention.

Why You'll Love Flower Corner

If you're seeking a calm, low-effort way to enjoy the pleasures of gardening, Flower Corner is perfect for you. With passive plant growth and plenty of customization options, you can create your own relaxing garden while working or browsing. Whether you're a plant enthusiast or just need a peaceful background game, Flower Corner brings the joy of greenery right to your desktop.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB MB available space

short_description: Flower Corner is a relaxing idle game where you grow and nurture plants while doing other tasks. Set at the bottom of your screen, it’s perfect for staying productive while watching your garden flourish. Unlock rare effects like glowing, sparkling, mist, and fluttering butterflies as you grow!
